name: stardust
short_effect: Sell for 1000 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 2000 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Beautiful red sand. Can be sold at a high price.
flavor_text.emerald: Beautiful red sand. Can be sold at a high price.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A pretty red sand with a loose, silky feel. It can be sold at a high price.
